name: I-Cataclysm
description:
To navigate in the menu press Tab to switch through the icons and Enter to confirm/

A small prototype for a first person platformer game where you move in low or 0G environment.

Small parcells of world completely destroyed as reality is collapsing.

You need to call god real quick so that he fixes all of that mess.

Use your phone to change reality around you/ (But well we didn't have time to implement that.

Made by : MrEloda https://mreloda.itch.io/ 3D Modeler

MrCheese https://fortunesgames.itch.io/ 3D Modeler/Programmer

SirFrogsAlot https://sirfrogsalot.itch.io/ Programmer

This prototype was made for the Mini Jame Gam #10 https://itch.io/jam/mini-jame-gam-10

We don't have much experience and maybe tried to bite too much by making a 3D game for a 3 day jam.
